location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Muscat to 'My dear Sir R'

mods.abstract: List regarding the rumours that the Political Appointments are to be changed, and should this be the case asking that his name be placed before the Viceroy in consideration of any suitable position and outlining his twenty-seven year career with the India Office.The letter also mentions Lord Stanley's offer to Pelly of a position with the Foreign Office and Pelly's feelings that after twenty-seven years with the India Office it is too late to change.
